author: m0_ox
content: ‚ö†Ô∏è  Heads up that the next test release will encode storage slots and values as `uint256`, based on the changes to the EIP here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10817. This will cause all current `bal-devnet-0` branches to fail because of hash mismatches in every single test until these branches are updated.

author: m0_ox
content: Following up with the new breaking release which includes the uint256 change for storage keys and slots in BAL [bal@v2.0.0](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v2.0.0). Clients will need to update their implemntations to reflect this in the `bal-devnet-0` branches.
